pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Fix some issues when exiting editor

content.raw: I can't reproduce this on my machine. Can you describe what's happening? Is it somehow similar to issue #1398? Does it only happen to walls, or also to windows, doors and stairs? At which point is the problem, does the wall brush become selected, does the cursor change to a cross, can you draw in the 2D view and the wall appears in the 3D view?
content.html: I can't reproduce this on my machine. Can you describe what's happening? Is it somehow similar to issue #1398? Does it only happen to walls, or also to windows, doors and stairs? At which point is the problem, does the wall brush become selected, does the cursor change to a cross, can you draw in the 2D view and the wall appears in the 3D view?
